BackstoryDef.title: roaming minstrel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wandered the grassy grottos of the rim with [PAWN_possessive] family, performing traditional music and poetry for wandering merchants and aristocrats. Over time, [PAWN_nameDef] was bought by a wealthy nobleman, and performed for he and his guests at social events and royal dinners. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was housed by this nobleman in a basement chamber, and never got to see [PAWN_possessive] family again.

BackstoryDef.title: troubadour
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was schooled within an affluent academy for the creatively gifted. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught not only to sing, but also to fight, and with time, [PAWN_pronoun] became proficient at doing both of these things on horseback.

BackstoryDef.title: rogue
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] troupe scouted the mountaintops for careless travellers and trade caravans. As they slept, [PAWN_nameDef] would strike from a distance with [PAWN_possessive] trusty bow, taking home a handsome bounty every time. \n\nUltimately, [PAWN_nameDef]’s troupe turned traitor and escaped with the group’s treasures, leaving [PAWN_nameDef] atop the cliffs without food, money, or even [PAWN_possessive] bow.

BackstoryDef.title: minstrel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] documented [PAWN_possessive] tribe’s history through poetry and elegies. Tribespeople would gather around the fire while [PAWN_nameDef] called out from above the flames, singing tales of life, death and love to all who would listen. \n\nThough [PAWN_pronoun] wrote in detail about the callous violence of the battlefield, [PAWN_nameDef] would never, ever step foot on bloodied soil for anyone.

BackstoryDef.title: gambler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: If [PAWN_nameDef] owned it, [PAWN_nameDef] would wager it; gold coins, animals, alcohol, even [PAWN_possessive] clothes, [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't afraid to risk anything for the chance of a hefty payout. Even now, you'll never find [PAWN_nameDef] without a trusty pack of cards in [PAWN_possessive] pocket.

BackstoryDef.title: entertainer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], with [PAWN_possessive] band of fellow performers, serenaded marketplace patrons with [PAWN_possessive] whimsical and comedic tunes. [PAWN_nameDef]’s lyrics told stories of legendary warriors, dramatic fantasies and witty anecdotes of [PAWN_possessive] own adventures.

BackstoryDef.title: luthier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] manufactured guitars for a living, overseeing the entire process. From felling the tree that the instrument was carved from, to teaching buyers how to play a tune or two before they took their new purchase home, [PAWN_nameDef] was a dab hand at it all.
